item.title: reading list 2020
item.description: the (partial) list of books that i plan to read, or have finished, in 2020 (in no particular order): Nonviolent Communication Living Nonviolent Communication Stamped from the Beginning How to Be an Antiracist The Autobiography of Malcolm X Things That Make White People Uncomfortable white Fragility The Art of War A Case of Brilliance Me and White Supremacy The Manager’s Path Unapologetic Becoming So You Want To Talk About Race Zami killing rage: Ending Racism Hood Feminism

item.title: projects
item.description: #100DayOfCode challenge 100DaysOfHealth challenge system builder: git + ansible + terraform + {{ stuff }} (project page forthcoming) (re)building my NAS (project page forthcoming) RaspberryPik3s

item.title: Raspberry Pik3s Pt1
item.description: overview with the announcement of the RaspberryPi-4B, i decided that it would be an inexpensive and fun way to learn Kubernetes by building a four node cluster, with Rancher’s k3s, hence raspberry pik3s or rpik3s. i used the pandemic’s extended stay-at-home to justify expanding this into an eight node cluster, and octopik3s.io was registered as a place to show graphs, logs, workloads, and whatnot. goals learn RaspberryPi learn some systems/hardware C programming learn Kubernetes create a home ‘lab’, and automate it learn Terraform and Go improve Python and Ansible create pretty graphs with Promethues, Netauto, and Grafana profit?

item.title: about
item.description: hello, i’m joshua, my pronouns are they/them/theirs. this will be a place for me to share my thoughts, learnings, projects, and other miscellanea…please note, i tend to not use capitlization. all views expressed are my own; any and all art/artwork is copyright its respective owner (myself if not otherwise noted).
